description: Goths are an infantry civilization that excels in massing cheap units and raiding enemy economy.
dark_age: Start with 4 villagers and a scout.
Build 2 houses, a lumber camp, and a mining camp.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 21-22 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 800-1000 food, 150-200 wood, and 150-200 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 4-5 villagers to food, 3-4 to wood, 1-2 to gold, and 3-4 to stone.
feudal_age: Build additional barracks and continue producing infantry units.
Build a blacksmith to upgrade infantry.
Advance to Castle Age at around 29-30 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 1500-2000 food, 600-800 wood, and 500-600 gold at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 12-14 villagers to food, 6-8 to wood, 2-3 to gold, and 4-5 to stone.
castle_age: Build more barracks and continue producing infantry units.
Build a siege workshop to produce rams.
Research the unique technology, Anarchy, to create huskarls from barracks.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 37-38 minutes with 1000 food, 1000 gold, and 800 stone.
Have around 3500-4000 food, 2000-2500 wood, and 1200-1500 gold at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 30-35 villagers to food, 16-20 to wood, 4-5 to gold, and 8-10 to stone.
imperial_age: Train huskarls and research the unique technology, Perfusion, to create them faster.
Use huskarls to raid enemy economy and rams to destroy buildings.
Have a large army of huskarls and rams to overwhelm the enemy.
Assign additional villagers to resources based on your needs.
